amendment.description: An amendment to decrease funds in the General Administration account of the Department of Veterans Affairs by $10 million and increase funds in the Information Technology Systems account of the Department of Veterans Affairs by the same amount to assist with claims processing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease funds in the General Administration account of the Department of Veterans Affairs by $10 million and increase funds in the Information Technology Systems account of the Department of Veterans Affairs by the same amount to assist with claims processing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Tipton.
